H0.text: which mode is used for short wave broadcast service. AM (Amplitude Modulation)

A4.text: AM remains in use in many forms of communication in addition to AM broadcasting: shortwave radio

A5.text: This is in contrast to frequency modulation (FM) and digital radio where the effect of such noise following demodulation is strongly reduced
